column1: English Sent: You must be wondering how these physical features have been formed.
Hindi Tansl: Apa yaha soca rahe hoMge ki yaha viBinna prakAra kI BU-AkqwiyAz kEse banIM?
Anu Translation:  Apa AScaryacakiwa howe rahe hoMge ki ye BOwika_wawva aiSeRawAeM kEse banAe gaye hEM
K#Apa#--#-#AScaryacakiwa howe rahe hoMge#kEse#ye#-#BOwika_wawva aiSeRawAeM#--#-#banAe gaye hEM
